name: Vessels Report
query:
select 
	tba.vessel_type as "Vessel Type",
	COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '1' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Jan 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '2' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Feb 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '3' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Mar 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '4' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Apr 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '5' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'May 2018',
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '6' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Jun 2018',
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '7' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Jul 2018',
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '8' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Aug 2018',
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '9' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Sep 2018',
     COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '10' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Oct 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '11' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Nov 2018',
    COUNT(CASE
        WHEN MONTH(tba.eta_date) = '12' and YEAR(tba.eta_date) = '2018' THEN tba.vessel
    END) 'Dec 2018'
	
from
	`tabBooking Request` tba
where
	tba.docstatus = 1
	and tba.vessel_type is not null
group by
	(tba.vessel_type)
